Text: I just bought this at Hot Topic a couple days ago! I love it.
you're not wrong :) its such an epic album!!!

I think the individuality found on this album is created by the mix of the bands' members, all coming from sort of different bands and combining into something truly magical in the Post-Hardcore genre.
Great download, fast & perfect quality. Also a sick band, best new band i've heard in a while.
THANKS lucifers_rockingchair & seeders!! Just discovered this band and it kicks major ass!! Lotta Love, DrScott
